# Rustic Retreat Weddings

## Site Information
- Name: Rustic Retreat Weddings
- Base URL: https://www.rusticretreat.xyz
- Location: Near Lac La Nonne, Alberta, Canada (99 km NW of Edmonton)

## Summary
Rustic Retreat Weddings is a multi-day outdoor wedding venue on 65 private acres. We offer 3-day ($4,500) and 5-day ($5,500) celebration packages that include exclusive property access, cabin accommodation for 4, camping for 60 guests, ceremony/reception seating for 80, and a curated d√©cor collection. Wedding season runs June through September.

## Key Pages
- Full Venue Information (AI/Press): https://www.rusticretreat.xyz/llm.html

- The Venue: https://www.rusticretreat.xyz/venue
- FAQs: https://www.rusticretreat.xyz/faqs

- Photo Gallery: https://www.rusticretreat.xyz/gallery
